languages.text:
strange limb changes, blisters and bumps on the body
Повышены WS 25, WILL 25, но уклонение снижено на 50%

traits.locale_text:
strange limb changes, blisters and bumps on the body
Повышены WS 25, WILL 25, но уклонение снижено на 50%

languages.text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.
languages.original_text:
Тело этого существа покрыто волдырями и наростами, а его конечности неестественно трансформированы.
Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} увеличены на 25, но {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} сокращено на 50%.

traits.locale_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps and its limbs are unnaturally transformed.
Its Weapon Skill and Willpower are increased by +25, but its dodge is reduced by −50%.

This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

languages.text:
Bu yaratığın vücudu, kabarcık ve şişliklerle kaplı. Uzuvları da anormal biçimde dönüşüme uğramış.
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} nitelikleri +25 artar ancak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri %50 azalır.
languages.original_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
Bu yaratığın vücudu, kabarcık ve şişliklerle kaplı. Uzuvları da anormal biçimde dönüşüme uğramış.
Silah Yeteneği ve İrade nitelikleri +25 artar ancak kaçınma değeri %50 azalır.

Bu yaratığın vücudu, kabarcık ve şişliklerle kaplı. Uzuvları da anormal biçimde dönüşüme uğramış.
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} nitelikleri +25 artar ancak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri %50 azalır.

languages.text:
Multitud de forúnculos y tumores cubren el cuerpo de esta criatura, y sus extremidades presentan deformidades antinaturales.
Su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} aumentan en +25, pero su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} se reduce en un −50 %.
languages.original_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
Multitud de forúnculos y tumores cubren el cuerpo de esta criatura, y sus extremidades presentan deformidades antinaturales.
Su Habilidad de armas y su Voluntad aumentan en +25, pero su esquiva se reduce en un −50 %.

languages.text:
此生物的身体布满了水疱与肿块，四肢不自然地扭曲着。
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高25点，但{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低50%。
languages.original_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
此生物的身体布满了水疱与肿块，四肢不自然地扭曲着。
此生物的武器技能与意志提高25点，但闪避降低50%。

languages.text:
Le corps de la créature est couvert de cloques et de bosses, et ses membres ont subi une transformation monstrueuse.
Sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} augmentent de +25, mais son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} est réduite de −50 %.
languages.original_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
Le corps de la créature est couvert de cloques et de bosses, et ses membres ont subi une transformation monstrueuse.
Sa Capacité de combat et sa Force mentale augmentent de +25, mais son esquive est réduite de −50 %.

languages.text:
この生物の体は、水ぶくれや腫れ物で覆われ、肢体が不自然に変形している。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+25増加するが、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が-50%減少する。
languages.original_text:
This creature's body is covered with blisters and bumps, its limbs unnaturally transformed.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
この生物の体は、水ぶくれや腫れ物で覆われ、肢体が不自然に変形している。
武器スキルと意志力が+25増加するが、回避が-50%減少する。

この生物の体は、水ぶくれや腫れ物で覆われ、肢体が不自然に変形している。
武器スキルと意志力が+25増加するが、回避が-50%減少する。

languages.text:
Der Körper dieser Kreatur ist mit Beulen und Geschwüren übersät, ihre Gliedmaßen sind unnatürlich verformt.
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} sind um +25 erhöht, aber {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} ist um -50 % reduziert.
languages.original_text:

Its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} are increased by +25, but its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is reduced by −50%.

traits.locale_text:
Der Körper dieser Kreatur ist mit Beulen und Geschwüren übersät, ihre Gliedmaßen sind unnatürlich verformt.
Waffenfähigkeit und Willenskraft sind um +25 erhöht, aber Ausweichen ist um -50 % reduziert.

languages.text:
Тело этого существа покрыто волдырями и наростами, а его конечности неестественно трансформированы.
Его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} увеличены на 25, но {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} сокращено на 50%.
